tool_description: Simple API to Calculate Flames score
name: Flames Love Calculator
title: Flames Love Calculator

api_list.name: /flame
api_list.description: Pass both name as path parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flames-love-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/flame/Rahul/Shefali"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flames-love-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://flames-love-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/flame/{fname}/{sname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flames-love-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
